thread.section_title: Vacatia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacatia | www.vacatia.com
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I travel quite a bit and prefer to stay in condos so I can have use of a kitchen, plus, the price is right. I have used many different travel websites but have gotten the best service with Vacatia, and try to use them if I can. Twice I needed to change my plans after making a reservation and Vacatia staff responded quickly to my requests and went to bat for me with the resort and took care of the issue. Awesome company, awesome customer service!
